MAIN_MESSAGE: It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 2.11pm in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford following reports of a grounded overhead line. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to replace a piece of equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.36PM on 21st January 2021.
